meanings.sent1: The topological map showed the different areas of the city.
meanings.sent2: The topological analysis revealed the key features of the network.
meanings.sent3: The topological puzzle was so confusing that it made everyone laugh.
meanings.sent4: Her topological thinking allowed her to see connections others missed.
meanings.sent5: The topological concept was as clear as a bright light in a dark room.

meanings.definition: Concerned with the properties of a geometric figure that are unaffected by continuous distortion.
meanings.sent1: The topological shapes remained the same even when stretched.
meanings.sent2: The topological study focused on shapes that kept their properties under change.
meanings.sent3: The topological experiment made the shapes dance around the room.
meanings.sent4: His topological mind saw the world in a different, unchanging way.
meanings.sent5: The topological principle was like a rock in a river, unmoved by the flow.
